alert.note: Alert for Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 10:05PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Marlboro County through 1030 PM EDT... At 1005 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chavistown, or near Bennettsville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bennettsville, Mccoll, Clio, Wallace, Chavistown, Dunbar and Tatum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
